jp.co.tanita.comm.ble

Interface TNTBLEManager.TNTBLEManagerListener

  • Enclosing class:
    TNTBLEManager

    public static interface TNTBLEManager.TNTBLEManagerListener
    The listener to recieve TNTBLEManager events.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onTNTBLEManagerStateUpdated(int state)
      Invoked when TNTBLEManager is generated or TNTBLEManager's state is updated.
      void onTNTBLEPeripheralConnected(TNTBLEManager manager, TNTBLEPeripheral peripheral, TNTDeviceInformation deviceInformation)
      Invoked when a connection is established successfully with peripheral.

      notice:TNTBLEManager.connect(int)， It could take a few seconds that this method (TNTBLEManager.connect(String, java.util.UUID, int, boolean)) is invoked since your app has invoked the connectWithIdentifier method.
      void onTNTBLEPeripheralConnectionFailed(TNTBLEManager manager, TNTBLEPeripheral peripheral, int error)
      Invoked when the TNTBLEManager fails to create a connection with peripheral.
      void onTNTBLEPeripheralConnectionIgnored(TNTBLEManager manager, int error)
      Invoked this method when the TNTBLEManager is starting the new connection process caused by imcompleting the connection process.
      void onTNTBLEPeripheralDisconnected(TNTBLEManager manager, TNTBLEPeripheral peripheral, int error)
      Invoked when an existing connection with peripheral is torn down.

    • Method Detail

      • onTNTBLEManagerStateUpdated

        void onTNTBLEManagerStateUpdated(int state)
        Invoked when TNTBLEManager is generated or TNTBLEManager's state is updated.
        Parameters:
        state - Current state of TNTBLEManager

      • onTNTBLEPeripheralConnected

        void onTNTBLEPeripheralConnected(TNTBLEManager manager,
                               TNTBLEPeripheral peripheral,
                               TNTDeviceInformation deviceInformation)
        Invoked when a connection is established successfully with peripheral.

        notice:TNTBLEManager.connect(int)， It could take a few seconds that this method (TNTBLEManager.connect(String, java.util.UUID, int, boolean)) is invoked since your app has invoked the connectWithIdentifier method.

        Parameters:
        manager - The TNTBLEManager providing this information which connection is established.．
        peripheral - The peripheral that has connected.
        deviceInformation - The informations of peripheral that has connected.

      • onTNTBLEPeripheralDisconnected

        void onTNTBLEPeripheralDisconnected(TNTBLEManager manager,
                                  TNTBLEPeripheral peripheral,
                                  int error)
        Invoked when an existing connection with peripheral is torn down.

        Parameters:
        manager - The TNTBLEManager providing this information which connection is lost.
        peripheral - The peripheral that has been disconnected from app.
        error - The cause of the failure.(refering to TNTBLEError）

      • onTNTBLEPeripheralConnectionFailed

        void onTNTBLEPeripheralConnectionFailed(TNTBLEManager manager,
                                      TNTBLEPeripheral peripheral,
                                      int error)
        Invoked when the TNTBLEManager fails to create a connection with peripheral.

        Parameters:
        manager - The TNTBLEManager providing this information which connecting to peripheral failed.
        peripheral - The peripheral that failed to connect.
        error - The cause of the failure.(refering to TNTBLEError)．

      • onTNTBLEPeripheralConnectionIgnored

        void onTNTBLEPeripheralConnectionIgnored(TNTBLEManager manager,
                                       int error)
        Invoked this method when the TNTBLEManager is starting the new connection process caused by imcompleting the connection process.
        Parameters:
        peripheral - The peripheral that failed to connect.
        error - The cause of the failure.(refering to TNTBLEError)．
